headline: First Payment Made in Southern California Edison’s Wildfire Recovery Compensation Program
summary: ROSEMEAD, Calif., December 16, 2025--Community members directly impacted by the Eaton Fire are getting compensation without delay to rebuild and recover. Just 45 days after Southern California Edison launched its Wildfire Recovery Compensation Program, the first payment has been made.

headline: IDU: Utilities Dashboard For December
summary: Water utilities are undervalued by 18% vs. 11-year averages, while electricity/multi-utilities and gas utilities are slightly overvalued. Learn more about IDU here.
